response.original_title: Peg + Cat: A Totally Awesome Christmas
response.overview: When Peg and Cat arrive in the North Pole, Santa is totally freaking out in The Christmas Problem. It's up to Peg and Cat to save Christmas when Santa accidentally blasts into outer space. With the help of their friend, Ramone, they'll discover that even the biggest problems can be broken down and solved step-by-step. Together, they'll save Christmas, fix Santa's toy-machine and deliver his presents.
response.title: Peg + Cat: A Totally Awesome Christmas
